parameter.title: List of POI
parameter.abstract: List of POIS (Name, Latitude, Longitude) tab separated values

parameter.title: Window size
parameter.abstract: The window size specifies the number of pixels surrounding the pixels derived from the given geographic coordinates to be exported

parameter.title: Pixel value aggregation method
parameter.abstract: The aggregation methods that may be used are: min, exports the minimum of the window values; max, exports the maximum of the window values; mean, exports mean and standard deviation of the window values or median, exports the median of the window values

workflow.title: Ocean Colour Atmospheric Correction extraction
workflow.abstract: This application extracts pixel values from participant evaluation runs
